Script Line: People disappear in broad daylight. As we watch on our screens. And do nothing.
Prompt: Urban protest scene with riot police dragging a person across a broken protest sign. Onlookers frozen, filming with phones, children's faces in shock. Moody lighting, gritty realism.

Script Line: We call ourselves free. We teach children to be kind. Yet we scroll past in silence. And pretend it's normal.
Prompt: Montage of news clips and social media feeds showing civil unrest, an angry child with a protest sign, fading into a man scrolling emotionlessly on his phone. Muted color palette, newsprint overlay style.

Script Line: Democracies fade away in silence. One right, one freedom at a time. Until all that remains is fear.  Regret.  Shame.
Prompt: Flickering candlelight fading into darkening courtroom and voting booth. Silhouettes watching in silence. Visual decay effect to black and white across frames.

Script Line: But, We The People.  We are many. They are few. And Democracy isn't what we watch. It's what we build.
Prompt: Rising shot of citizens gathering in sunny public town center, overlay of a digital map glowing with pins, close-up of hands creating protest signs, young people painting murals of people.

Script Line: GroupBuild doesn't serve the system. It rewrites it.
Prompt: Stylized overlay of the GroupBuild UI showing pins dropping on a map, chat interface opening, and event scheduling. Futuristic tech overlays with activist energy.

Script Line: Find your people. Feel their power. Feel yours.  Map. Meet. Move.
Prompt: Faces light up as people find nearby supporters on screen, hug in person, march together in unity. Emotive camera pans, diverse ages and backgrounds.

Script Line: No kings. No scapegoats. Just us.
Prompt: Montage of grassroots organizations, no single leader. Groups forming circles, voting on whiteboards, people lifting each other. Torchlight shared hand to hand.

Script Line: Join Us. We the People. Empowered.
Prompt: Overhead crowd forming the shape of a torch in a shield. Torch flares to white. GroupBuild logo and call-to-action fade in: 'We The People”, “Empowered”, “GroupBuild.org'.
